TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {120593=Lightology © Copyright 2015, 81182=The Modern Fan Company stands alone in bringing original design and innovation to the ceiling fan industry. The designs celebrate the modern idiom trough mechanical simplification, geometric forms and contemporary finishes. In 1986, Ron Rezek was approached with the idea of updating the 100-year-old ceiling fan. An accomplished industrial designer with successes in areas from lighting and furniture to rescue equipment, Rezek recognized thet he could introduce contemporary design to the ceiling fan market. The Stratos fan was born and forged the path for an evolution in ceiling fan design.}
textBeforeTable: Altus Hugger is a beautifully sculpted design intended for low-ceiling applications. Another example of Ron Rezek using pure geometry to bring forth attractive and sophisticated design. Artistically compact, the Altus features an organic shape that lends itself to virtually any interior. Available in Brushed Aluminum and Gloss White motor with Aluminum and White blades. Available in 36 inch, 42 inch, or 52 inch blade spans. UL listed. 36 Inch: 36 inch width x 12 inch height. 42 Inch: 42 inch width x 12 inch height. 52 Inch: 52 inch width x 12 inch height. Designed by Ron Rezek read more... Altus Hugger Fan No Light REVIEWS BRAND TECHNICAL OPTIONS DESCRIPTION Shown in: Gloss White / White
textAfterTable: Dimensions: 12"H x 52"W Download Specification Sheet  UL About Modern Fan Co. The Modern Fan Company stands alone in bringing original design and innovation to the ceiling fan industry. The designs celebrate the modern idiom trough mechanical simplification, geometric forms and contemporary finishes. In 1986, Ron Rezek was approached with the idea of updating the 100-year-old ceiling fan. An accomplished industrial designer with successes in areas from lighting and furniture to rescue equipment, Rezek recognized thet he could introduce contemporary design to the ceiling fan market. The Stratos fan was born and forged the path for an evolution in ceiling fan design. Customer Reviews of Altus Hugger Fan No Light There are no reviews yet. Be the first to write one!
